name: Live2DViewerEX Face Tracker
description: Before you install please note:  - This application is an extended application of Live2DViewerEX, which can capture facial information through a mobile phone and transfer data to Live2DViewerEX for Steam via network. - This app requires Live2DViewerEX for Steam. - This is a beta program, which means it might crash, or some features might not work properly when you use it, I DO NOT promise anything for it.   Steam store page https://store.steampowered.com/app/616720/Live2DViewerEX/   Features:  - Remote control: supports up to 8 devices controlling 8 models  - 30-point face tracking  - 12 controllable parameters
